name: Bretta
logic: (LISTEN ? TRUE) + (Fungus2_23 + (FULLCLAW + FULLDASH | FULLCLAW + FULLSUPERDASH | LEFTCLAW + WINGS | RIGHTCLAW + ENEMYPOGOS + WINGS | COMPLEXSKIPS + FULLCLAW + $SHADESKIP[2HITS] + SPELLAIRSTALL + $CASTSPELL[1,1,before:ROOMSOUL] + $TAKEDAMAGE[2]))

name: Bardoon
logic: (LISTEN ? TRUE) + (Deepnest_East_04[left1] + (WINGS | (LEFTCLAW + LEFTDASH | RIGHTCLAW + RIGHTDASH) + ENEMYPOGOS) | Deepnest_East_04[right1] + (WINGS | ENEMYPOGOS +(LEFTCLAW + LEFTDASH | RIGHTCLAW + RIGHTDASH) + (FIREBALLSKIPS + FIREBALL | LEFTDASH)) | Deepnest_East_04[left2] + (WINGS + RIGHTSUPERDASH + (LEFTCLAW + LEFTDASH | RIGHTDASH) + ACIDSKIPS | ACID) + (WINGS | (LEFTCLAW | RIGHTCLAW) + ENEMYPOGOS))

name: Fluke_Hermit
logic: (LISTEN ? TRUE) + (BREAKABLE_RoomGGShortcut_BreakableGrate ? TRUE) + ((Room_GG_Shortcut[top1] | Room_GG_Shortcut[left1] + (LEFTCLAW + WINGS | RIGHTCLAW) + (RIGHTCLAW + WINGS | (WINGS + LEFTDASH | WINGS + LEFTSUPERDASH | SWIM) + (RIGHTCLAW + (RIGHTDASH | LEFTCLAW + (RIGHTSUPERDASH | ENEMYPOGOS))) | LEFTCLAW + RIGHTDASH + WINGS + PRECISEMOVEMENT)) + (SWIM | (FULLCLAW + RIGHTSUPERDASH + ACIDSKIPS)))

name: Dung_Defender
logic: (LISTEN ? TRUE) + Defeated_Dung_Defender + (Waterways_05[bot1] + (LEFTCLAW | RIGHTCLAW | WINGS) | Waterways_05[bot2] | Waterways_05[right1])
